00011 // spot.cpp*
00012 #include "pbrt.h"
00013 #include "light.h"
00014 #include "shape.h"
00015 // SpotLight Declarations
00016 class SpotLight : public Light {
00017 public:
00018         // SpotLight Public Methods
00019         SpotLight(const Transform &light2world, const Spectrum &, float width, float fall);
00020         Spectrum Sample_L(const Point &p, Vector *wi, VisibilityTester *vis) const;
00021         bool IsDeltaLight() const { return true; }
00022         float Falloff(const Vector &w) const;
00023         Spectrum Power(const Scene *) const {
00024                 return Intensity * 2.f * M_PI *
00025                         (1.f - .5f * (cosFalloffStart + cosTotalWidth));
00026         }
00027         Spectrum Sample_L(const Point &P, float u1, float u2,
00028                         Vector *wo, float *pdf, VisibilityTester *visibility) const;
00029         Spectrum Sample_L(const Scene *scene, float u1, float u2,
00030                         float u3, float u4, Ray *ray, float *pdf) const;
00031         float Pdf(const Point &, const Vector &) const;
00032 private:
00033         // SpotLight Private Data
00034         float cosTotalWidth, cosFalloffStart;
00035         Point lightPos;
00036         Spectrum Intensity;
00037 };
00038 // SpotLight Method Definitions
00039 SpotLight::SpotLight(const Transform &light2world,
00040                 const Spectrum &intensity, float width, float fall)
00041         : Light(light2world) {
00042         lightPos = LightToWorld(Point(0,0,0));
00043         Intensity = intensity;
00044         cosTotalWidth = cosf(Radians(width));
00045         cosFalloffStart = cosf(Radians(fall));
00046 }
00047 Spectrum SpotLight::Sample_L(const Point &p, Vector *wi,
00048                 VisibilityTester *visibility) const {
00049         *wi = Normalize(lightPos - p);
00050         visibility->SetSegment(p, lightPos);
00051         return Intensity * Falloff(-*wi) /
00052                 DistanceSquared(lightPos, p);
00053 }
00054 float SpotLight::Falloff(const Vector &w) const {
00055         Vector wl = Normalize(WorldToLight(w));
00056         float costheta = wl.z;
00057         if (costheta < cosTotalWidth)
00058                 return 0.;
00059         if (costheta > cosFalloffStart)
00060                 return 1.;
00061         // Compute falloff inside spotlight cone
00062         float delta = (costheta - cosTotalWidth) /
00063                 (cosFalloffStart - cosTotalWidth);
00064         return delta*delta*delta*delta;
00065 }
00066 Spectrum SpotLight::Sample_L(const Point &p, float u1, float u2,
00067                 Vector *wi, float *pdf, VisibilityTester *visibility) const {
00068         *pdf = 1.f;
00069         return Sample_L(p, wi, visibility);
00070 }
00071 float SpotLight::Pdf(const Point &, const Vector &) const {
00072         return 0.;
00073 }
00074 Spectrum SpotLight::Sample_L(const Scene *scene, float u1,
00075                 float u2, float u3, float u4,
00076                 Ray *ray, float *pdf) const {
00077         ray->o = lightPos;
00078         Vector v = UniformSampleCone(u1, u2, cosTotalWidth);
00079         ray->d = LightToWorld(v);
00080         *pdf = UniformConePdf(cosTotalWidth);
00081         return Intensity * Falloff(ray->d);
00082 }
00083 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Light *CreateLight(const Transform &l2w, const ParamSet &paramSet) {
00084         Spectrum I = paramSet.FindOneSpectrum("I", Spectrum(1.0));
00085         float coneangle = paramSet.FindOneFloat("coneangle", 30.);
00086         float conedelta = paramSet.FindOneFloat("conedeltaangle", 5.);
00087         // Compute spotlight world to light transformation
00088         Point from = paramSet.FindOnePoint("from", Point(0,0,0));
00089         Point to = paramSet.FindOnePoint("to", Point(0,0,1));
00090         Vector dir = Normalize(to - from);
00091         Vector du, dv;
00092         CoordinateSystem(dir, &du, &dv);
00093         Transform dirToZ =
00094                 Transform(new Matrix4x4( du.x,  du.y,  du.z, 0.,
00095                                          dv.x,  dv.y,  dv.z, 0.,
00096                                         dir.x, dir.y, dir.z, 0.,
00097                                             0,     0,     0, 1.));
00098         Transform light2world =
00099         l2w *
00100         Translate(Vector(from.x, from.y, from.z)) *
00101         dirToZ.GetInverse();
00102         return new SpotLight(light2world, I, coneangle,
00103                 coneangle-conedelta);
00104 }
